import React from 'react' import Input from '../Input/Input' import Back from '../Back/Back' import UploadFile from './UploadFilesSection/UploadFilesPart' import './Upload.css' class Upload extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.addFile = this.addFile.bind(this) this.deleteFile = this.deleteFile.bind(this) } render() { return (
Видимость
Описание
) } deleteFile(id) { this.setState({ files: this.state.files.filter((el)=>el.id !== id) }) } addFile(file) { const id = this.state.files.length + 1 this.setState({files: [...this.state.files, {id, ...file}]}) } } export default Upload
